verbs.description: After [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: called] out [ARG1: The New York Times] [ARGM-CAU: for incorrectly estimating the crowd - size of a rally in Tennessee] , the paper made the correction and responded by saying , " When we get it wrong , we say so . "

After President Donald Trump called out [ARG0: The New York Times] for [ARGM-MNR: incorrectly] [V: estimating] [ARG1: the crowd - size of a rally in Tennessee] , the paper made the correction and responded by saying , " When we get it wrong , we say so . "
